faqs.question: What is my refund status?
faqs.answer: Refunds are usually processed within 5–7 business days after the return or cancellation is approved.

faqs.question: When will I get my refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are usually processed within 5–7 business days after the return or cancellation is approved.

faqs.question: Refund not received yet
faqs.answer: Your refund is currently being processed. You’ll receive it shortly.

faqs.question: How long does refund take?
faqs.answer: Refunds are credited within 5–7 business days after approval, depending on your payment method.

faqs.question: I want to request a refund
faqs.answer: Sure! Please share your order ID so we can initiate the refund process.

faqs.question: How can I apply for a refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds can be initiated for eligible cancelled or returned orders. You can start from the 'My Orders' section.

faqs.question: How will I get my refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are issued to your original payment method or wallet, depending on how you paid.

faqs.question: Where will I receive my refund?
faqs.answer: For prepaid orders, refunds go to your original payment source. For COD orders, refunds are sent to your registered bank account.

faqs.question: Will I get a full refund?
faqs.answer: You’ll receive a full refund if your order was cancelled before shipping.

faqs.question: Why is my refund not full?
faqs.answer: In some cases, delivery or restocking charges may apply depending on the product type or return condition.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 working days after product inspection or cancellation approval.

faqs.question: Refund terms and conditions
faqs.answer: Refunds are credited to the original payment method or wallet as per our refund policy.

faqs.question: I want to replace my product
faqs.answer: Sure! Please share your order ID and reason for replacement.

faqs.question: How can I replace my item?
faqs.answer: You can request a replacement within 7 days of delivery if the item is defective or damaged.

faqs.question: Check replacement status
faqs.answer: Your replacement request is approved and will be shipped soon.

faqs.question: When will I get my replacement?
faqs.answer: Your replacement request is in progress. You’ll receive updates once it’s dispatched.

faqs.question: Is my product eligible for replacement?
faqs.answer: Replacements are available for damaged, defective, or incorrect items within 7 days of delivery.

faqs.question: Can I replace my order after 7 days?
faqs.answer: Replacement requests must be raised within 7 days of delivery for eligibility.

faqs.question: What is your replacement policy?
faqs.answer: Replacement is allowed within 7 days of delivery for eligible products.

faqs.question: Do you allow replacement for all products?
faqs.answer: Some products like perishables, innerwear, or customized items are not eligible for replacement.

faqs.question: Should I go for refund or replacement?
faqs.answer: You can choose a refund if you prefer not to receive a replacement product.

faqs.question: Can I get refund instead of replacement?
faqs.answer: If the item is defective, both refund and replacement options are available. You can choose whichever you prefer.
